item.title: Group sequential trials in industry: a 30-year perspective
item.description: Photo by Estée Janssens. I’m delighted to share that our paper, Some Group Sequential Trials From Industry Over the Last 30 Years, has been published in Statistics in Biopharmaceutical Research. You can download the accepted manuscript (PDF, 457 KB) here. Key takeaways The paper began as a conference talk presented by Keaven, our lead author, in 2022. Recognizing the value of these stories, we decided to develop them into a full-length paper.
